results.title: INSR novel mutations identified in a Chinese family with severe INSR-related insulin resistance syndromes: A case report
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was prescribed @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (250 mg) at breakfast and lunch, which was increased to 500 mg after 1 month.

citations.NLM: Yu L, Yu F, Ma Z, Lu H, Luo J, Sun T, Liu Q, Gan S. INSR novel mutations identified in a Chinese family with severe INSR-related insulin resistance syndromes: A case report Medicine (Baltimore). 2022 Dec 9;101(49):e32266. PMID: 36626508

results.title: [Hirsutism and hypertrichosis in adults: investigations and treatment].

results.title: [Treatment experience with metformin in polycystic ovary syndrome].

results.title: Successful rhIGF1 treatment for over 5 years in a patient with severe insulin resistance due to homozygous insulin receptor mutation.
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was treated with twice daily injections of rhIGF1 and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for more than 5 years with improvement in her @DISEASE_Acanthosis_Nigricans @DISEASE_MESH:D000052 @@@acanthosis nigricans@@@, @DISEASE_Hyperkeratosis_Epidermolytic @DISEASE_MESH:D017488 @@@hyperkeratosis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrichosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006983 @@@hypertrichosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Carmody D, Ladsaria SS, Buikema RK, Semple RK, Greeley SA. Successful rhIGF1 treatment for over 5 years in a patient with severe insulin resistance due to homozygous insulin receptor mutation. Diabet Med. 2016 Mar;33(3):e8-e12. PMID: 26262567
citations.BibTeX: @article{26262567, title={Successful rhIGF1 treatment for over 5 years in a patient with severe insulin resistance due to homozygous insulin receptor mutation.}, author={Carmody D and Ladsaria SS and Buikema RK and Semple RK and Greeley SA}, journal={Diabet Med}, volume={33}, number={3}, pages={e8-e12}}
